words.definition: A very large gray animal with a long trunk and big ears
examples: The elephant used its trunk to drink water.
Elephants are the biggest land animals.

story.title: A Day at the Zoo
story.text: Today was an amazing day at the zoo! First, I saw a huge elephant spraying water with its trunk. The elephant was so gentle and smart. Next, I heard a loud roar from the lion. The lion looked powerful and brave as it walked around. Then I spotted a tall giraffe eating leaves from a tree. The giraffe's long neck helped it reach the highest branches. A zebra ran past with its black and white stripes shining in the sun. Finally, a playful monkey swung from branch to branch, making everyone laugh. What an adventure!

fillInBlank.sentence: The ___ used its trunk to spray water.

comprehension.question: Which animal did the person see first at the zoo?
